And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto me the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

And it came to pass <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6965>me<s%>, Arise, <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> from <S%H6680>thence<s%>, which I commanded thee to hide <S%H2934>there<s%>.

Then I <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, and <S%H2658>digged<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> from the <S%H4725>place<s%> where I had <S%H2934>hid<s%> <S%H232>it<s%>; and, behold, the girdle was <S%H7843>marred<s%>, it was profitable for <S%H6743>nothing<s%>.
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, After this manner will I <S%H7843>mar<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

This <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, that <S%H3987>refuse<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>, that <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and are <S%H3212>gone<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H7812>them<s%>, and to worship <S%H232>them<s%>, shall even be as this girdle, which is profitable for <S%H6743>nothing<s%>.

For as the <S%H232>girdle<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> to the <S%H4975>loins<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>, so have I caused to <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto me the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; that they may be unto me for a <S%H5971>people<s%>, and for a <S%H8034>name<s%>, and for a <S%H8416>praise<s%>, and for a <S%H8597>glory<s%>: but they would not <S%H8085>hear<s%>.

Therefore thou shalt <S%H559>speak<s%> unto them this <S%H1697>word<s%>: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Every <S%H5035>bottle<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3196>wine<s%>: and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3045>thee<s%>, Do we not certainly <S%H3045>know<s%> that every <S%H5035>bottle<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3196>wine<s%>?

Then shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H4390>Behold<s%>, I will fill all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H776>land<s%>, even the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H3678>throne<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, with <S%H7943>drunkenness<s%>.

And I will <S%H5310>dash<s%> them <S%H376>one<s%> against <S%H251>another<s%>, even the <S%H1>fathers<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: I will not <S%H2550>pity<s%>, nor <S%H2347>spare<s%>, nor have <S%H7355>compassion<s%>, that I should not destroy <S%H7843>them<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H238>ye<s%>, and give ear; be not <S%H1361>proud<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, before he cause <S%H2821>darkness<s%>, and before your <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H5062>stumble<s%> upon the <S%H5399>dark<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, <S%H6960>and<s%>, while ye look for <S%H216>light<s%>, he <S%H7760>turn<s%> it into the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>, and <S%H7896>make<s%> it gross <S%H6205>darkness<s%>.

But if ye will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H5315>it<s%>, my soul shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> in <S%H4565>secret<s%> <S%H6440>for<s%> your <S%H1466>pride<s%>; and mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H1830>weep<s%> <S%H1830>sore<s%>, and run <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H1832>tears<s%>, because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H5739>flock<s%> is taken <S%H7617>captive<s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> thou unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> and to the <S%H1377>queen-mother<s%>, <S%H8213>Humble<s%> <S%H3427>yourselves<s%>, sit down; for your <S%H4761>headtires<s%> are come <S%H3381>down<s%>, even the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of your <S%H8597>glory<s%>.

The <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%> are shut <S%H5462>up<s%>, and there is none to <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H3063>them<s%>: Judah is carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%>, all of <S%H7965>it<s%>; it is wholly carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> them that <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%>: where is the <S%H5739>flock<s%> that was <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H8597>thee<s%>, thy beautiful <S%H6629>flock<s%>?

What wilt thou <S%H559>say<s%>, when he shall <S%H6485>set<s%> over thee as <S%H7218>head<s%> those whom thou hast thyself <S%H3925>taught<s%> to be <S%H441>friends<s%> to <S%H2256>thee<s%>? shall not sorrows <S%H270>take<s%> hold of <S%H802>thee<s%>, as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail<s%>?

And if thou <S%H559>say<s%> in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, Wherefore are these things <S%H7122>come<s%> upon <S%H7230>me<s%>? for the greatness of thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> are thy <S%H7757>skirts<s%> <S%H1540>uncovered<s%>, and thy <S%H6119>heels<s%> suffer <S%H2554>violence<s%>.

Can the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H2015>change<s%> his <S%H5785>skin<s%>, or the <S%H5246>leopard<s%> his <S%H2272>spots<s%>? then <S%H3201>may<s%> ye also do <S%H3190>good<s%>, that are <S%H3928>accustomed<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil<s%>.
